content: Shares of HD Supply Holdings  sank as much as 19 percent after the construction materials supplier reported another drop in margins at its biggest unit  while announcing the sale of its second-biggest unit  where margins have been relatively steady.
name: HD Supply Holdings Inc
title: HD Supply to sell waterworks unit; shares slump on weak margins

content: June 6 Shares of HD Supply Holdings sank as much as 19 percent after the construction materials supplier reported another drop in margins at its biggest unit  while announcing the sale of its second-biggest unit  where margins have been relatively steady.
name: HD Supply Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 3-HD Supply to sell waterworks unit; shares slump on weak margins

content: * HD Supply enters into definitive agreement to sell its waterworks business unit to Clayton  Dubilier & Rice
name: HD Supply Holdings Inc
title: BRIEF-HD Supply to sell Waterworks unit to Clayton  Dubilier & Rice for $2.5 bln

content: June 6 HD Supply Holdings  which is one of the largest industrial distributors in North America  said on Tuesday it would sell its Waterworks unit to private equity firm Clayton  Dubilier & Rice for $2.5 billion in cash.
name: HD Supply Holdings Inc
title: HD Supply to sell Waterworks unit for $2.5 bln

content: HD Supply Holdings Inc  is preparing to explore a sale of Waterworks  the largest U.S. provider of water and sewer products to contractors and municipalities  following interest from buyout firms  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: HD Supply Holdings Inc
title: Exclusive: HD Supply to explore sale of Waterworks unit - sources
